mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.studentId, c.lectureId, c.rdate , s.name AS student_name, l.title As lecture_title , l.topic AS lecture_topic, l.price AS lecture_price , l.target AS lecture_target, l.img AS lecture_img FROM cart c, student s, lecture l WHERE c.studentId = s.id And c.lectureId = l.id AND c.lectureId = #{lectureId} AND c.studentId = #{studentId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (id, studentId, lectureId) VALUES (cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{studentId}, #{lectureId})
